rules_text: Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens. Strategize. [i](Put the top card of your tactic deck into your hand.)[/i]
notes:
Existing cards have a mix of formatting for effects like this:

Do blah. Strategize. (default)

Do blah, then strategize. (only if effects are directly related)

Do blah.
Strategize. (seldom seen)

4+
